home.content:
# Lecture 3: Homework
---
**DUE DATE:** Tuesday 11/30 at 6PM

Your objective for this assignment is to get comfortable with layouts in CSS while continuing to use the box model.

## Assignment
---
Please complete the Startup Matchmaker website. You will find the page materials (ie: content and images) **[here](https://github.com/FEWDMaterials/FEWD_Developer_Matchmaker)**.

#### Part one
---
Create a new repo on [GitHub](https://github.com/). Call it **developermatchmaker**. (All lower case, no caps).

You should use the code you started in class on **Saturday**. Whenever appropriate, please **commit** your changes to your GitHub repo.

**NOTE:** You should commit often. Try to create your page in sections to get into the habit of committing often.

#### Part two
---

**Final Projects!** Please draw or produce a rough layout of your final project for **Tuesday**. In general, we'd like for you to have picked an idea out by this week. Additionally, we'd like to see that you've thought through the features you'd like implemented on your site. 

The outline does not have to be anything too intense, something sketched on a piece of paper is just fine. As long as we see that you've a good sense of what it is you'd like to build we can work with you to figure out what technologies you'll need and how we can best help you. 

### Submission Guidelines
---

1. Once you are happy with your website, please push it to [GitBot](http://gitbot.co).
2. Remember to give GitBot a few minutes to upload your site to its servers! **Also remember to name your homepage index.html**.
3. **Using the slack slash command for homework**, submit the URL from gitbot via Slack. Should be something like **`/homework [URL]`**.
4. ???
5. Profit.
